You do not need to be elegant by stating it. Simply a basic yet genuine “Thank you.” will be all she requires from you. 5. Rain compliments over her Compliments are another way of revealing that you value her. These are words that can make her feel like the center of the universe. Inform her that her hair looks great, or she looks gorgeous in her gown during a date. There is no question that she took some time and effort to look good. So, always compliment her. 6. It is type of simple and simple when you believe of it. However, unfortunately, numerous people forget that holding her hand is very important. 7.
